Articles.Content: Hi all i have a quick question,when i tryed the demo i had traning video,s about how to take off and the aircraft functions and it but now i have the full game all i have is orbiting 101 and to the mun part 1,is this all the traning video,s that are in the game?
Currently, yes. The game is still a work in progress, and they took the old tutorials out in this version. But there are lots of player-made tutorials stickied at the top of the how-to page.
